thumb.name: Happy Gift Giving
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3EGift Tag Instructions:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E1. To personalize and print this project, click on the preview image to the left to open the workspace.%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E2. Personalize the text and graphics. Select the text to change it or its size, color, and font. Even add digital photos!%3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E3. Click on the Print button, select the number of copies you'd like to print and go!. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E%3Cb%3ETips:%3C/b%3E Print your gift tags on plain paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. %3Cbr/%3E%3Cbr/%3E

thumb.name: Reindeer Wishes
thumb.verse: %3CB%3EGift tags%3C/B%3E will add a charming touch to all your packages!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E Paper. 8 1/2 x 11 inches.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalize and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Create %26 Print workspace.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EMake text changes as desired.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3CB%3EPrint Project%3C/B%3E to send finished Gift Tag to the printer.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3ECut%3C/B%3E along solid lines.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3EFold%3C/B%3E along dotted lines (if applicable).%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3ETo make matching envelope (if applicable) with design side facing down. fold up flaps along dotted lines. Tape or glue bottom and side flaps to secure.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3EFor hanging Gift Tags. carefully cut or punch out the hole at the top.%3C/LI%3E%3CLI%3E%3CB%3ETie%3C/B%3E a string or ribbon through the hole.%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment. spelling. and overall look of the project. A Gift Tag can be used instead of. or in addition to a greeting card.
